name: HermeneutiX
short_description:
HermeneutiX is a tool for diagramming syntactic and semantic structures of complex (not necessarily foreign-language) texts (e.g. bible or other historical excerpts).

For further information, please take a look at our wiki here on SourceForge:
https://sourceforge.net/p/hermeneutix/wiki/

HINT: If you are using the Mac .app and getting the "HermeneutiX.app is damaged and can´t be opened" error, use the portable distribution instead (double-click on hermeneutix.jar) or consider the following link:
http://www.tech-recipes.com/rx/45404/mac-downloaded-app-is-damaged-and-cant-be-opened-error-solved/

Feel free to contact us via email.


PS: To run a Java application such as HermeneutiX you need a Java Runtime Environment (JRE). HermeneutiX is currently built to be compatible down to JRE version 5.
You may download the current JRE here: http://www.java.com/en/download
summary: Your graphical tool for Syntactic/Semantic Structure Analysis of texts
